transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji good morning madam Vanshika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ji ji bataiye madam.
Executive: Haan ji madam abhi kaisa response hai buyleads vagaira ka?
Customer: Madam buyleads jyada nahi hai. 
Customer: Mujhe koi difference nahi aaya hai. 
Customer: Adiktar jo hai woh jo aapko
Executive: Aapko kuch mile interested companies?
Customer: Aapko jo buylead hai jo aapne consume ki thi.
Executive: Madam aapke voice mein break ho rahi hai. Haan main puch rahi hu ki jo aapne buylead consume ki thi usme se kuch positive feedback mila aapko?
Customer: Yahi main bata deti hu aapko ek positive feedback hai koi Home Enterprises hai.
Customer: Un bhai sahab se contact hua aur WhatsApp unhe ko aaya hai. Ab tak mujhe unka proper response hi nahi hai ab tak unhone GST number bhi nahi bheja hai woh apna.
Customer: Aapke paas hai GST number hai hi nahi. Toh mujhe aap logo ne list kiya tha toh mujhe kaha gaya tha GST number aisa hoga.
Customer: Unko without GST bhi.
Executive: Madam aap ek second ek second madam voice na break ho rahi hai aapki. Sahi se samajh nahi aa raha hai mujhe. Whatsapp pe call karu? Whatsapp pe call karu?
Executive: Nahi nahi madam yeh recorded line se hoti hai call.
Customer: Abhi aap boliye.
Customer: Ek second main dekhti hu. Nahi.
Customer: Mere paas ab tak koi bhi genuine cheez nahi aayi hai koi bhi single client bhi nahi mila hai. Ek person hai jinse meri baat chal rahi hai Home Enterprises walon se. Unke paas abhi GST number nahi hai dene ke liye. Without GST number pe kaise yakin kare?
Customer: Jab mujhe aap logo ne list kiya tha toh mujhe kaha gaya tha GST proper bhariye.
Executive: Haan toh woh maine aapko woh jab maine aapko bataya tha ki GST wala filter hota hai woh aapne buylead jo consume ki thi uske woh lagaya tha GST filter?
Customer: GST filter lagane ke baad bhi koi lead nahi hai usme. Jisse main baat kar saku.
Customer: GST wale?
Customer: Ji haan aap dekho agar aapko system pe toh dekho GST lagake dekho aapko lead nahi aayi.
Customer: Fir bhi jyada ek hai teen din pehle ki hai ek hotel staff recruitment services ki hotel ka main dekhti nahi madam. Hotel ki services center usme mujhe hotel ka staff hi nahi hai mere paas. Main kaafi logo ka staff bhi nahi karti. Main ek hi cheez se kar rahi hu main industry ke liye kaam karti hu keval. Mere paas staff industry ka baitha hua hai.
Executive: Thik hai aur jo madam aapne woh buylead jo consume ki thi na woh jyadatar aise hi hoti hai.
Customer: GST jyadatar aisa hota hai aapke paas.
Executive: Okay toh woh jo madam woh aapne jo buylead consume ki thi jisme aap positive feedback bata rahe ho woh jab woh aapne consume ki thi usme GST likha hua tha ya nahi likha hua tha?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi likha hua tha. Usme GST nahi tha. Nahi likha hua tha. Sirf company ka naam likha hua tha Home Enterprises toh mujhe laga ki yeh fake jo aap feature nahi hai koi company hogi toh maine unse contact kiya.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Kya kya response dete hai. Tab se hum unse insist kar rahe hai ki aap apna mujhe apna GST number de agar aapki company hai toh main aapko sabhi provide karti hu. He is not able to provide. Woh keh rahe hai ki hamare paas bulk mein hiring chal rahi hai hamare paas bulk mein itna banda hai itna hiring. Jab tak unke paas GST number nahi milega.
Customer: Hmm ji.
Executive: Thik hai toh yeh toh chota sa kaam hai GST ka. Mere paas GST number hai toh phir puri company ke paas GST number nahi hoga?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji woh toh wohi baat maine unko WhatsApp pe batai thi unhone bhi mujhe yahi kaha ki aap GST filter laga liya karo. Ab main GST filter lagake kaam karti hu na madam. Ek jo jo person itna provide kar rahe hai uska mujhe koi bhi nahi milta.
Executive: Thik hai madam jaise aap
Customer: Digital marketing ke liye kuch mujhe mil jaye.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Madam fir se repeat karna ek baar kya bola aapne?
Customer: Main puch main bol rahi hu ek baar fir se repeat karenge kya bola aapne?
Customer: Digital marketing ki jo maine service lagayi hai na digital marketing and designing iske liye bhi agar kuch ho toh bata dijiye. Recruitment service digital marketing ke liye.
Customer: Digital marketing ke liye.
Executive: Ji haan.
Executive: Thik hai madam jo aap buylead matlab GST verified ka kabse nahi aa raha jabse meri aapse baat hui thi tabse ek bhi buylead aapko nahi dikhi GST wali?
Customer: GST wale jo GST GST number wale buylead se karti bhi hu toh woh mere kaam ki nahi hoti. Jo woh main dekhti hu woh jyadatar restaurant type ki hai.
Customer: Haan matlab alag consume kare woh mere liye.
Customer: Service center dekha hai karke thik hai abhi call kari hai maine. Yeh person jo hai se hai isko keval 10-15 page karwane hai. Thik hai iske paas bulk mein kaam nahi hai page hai iske woh karwane hai isko. Uske baad hai yeh jaise maker supply service iska bhi GST nahi tha company ka naam tha yaha pe isliye maine unko call kari. Uske baad inhone call uthai toh unko call kar chuki hu. Iske pehle ek hai please Mahesh Kumar SK Enterprises inko maine call kari thi inko shayad requirement ho inka bhi recent hi call aayi thi maine call kari thi nahi hai requirement. Iske alawa ek yeh dekhenge digital marketing service Jeetu Bharti se isko raat ko call ki thi maine is person ne mujhe bataya ki isko yeh SEO samajhte ho aap woh chahiye. Toh maine apni website bani hogi aapka kuch
Customer: Facebook vagaira ho gaya kuch vagaira ho gaya toh woh usme.
Customer: Isko bolne se pehle ek bech chatao ko ban jaye toh inko asal wanted dwara inko dobara contact karungi digital marketing ki services ke liye agar inke paas kuch hai toh.
Executive: Thik hai abhi main na madam aapko jaise ek second main abhi aapko back call kar rahi hu kyuki voice na bahut jyada ho rahi hai jaise abhi kar rahi hu call karte thik hai.
Executive: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving enough relevant buyleads.

- Expressed concern about lack of GST numbers.

- Wants leads related to digital marketing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about GST filter.

- Executive offered to call back due to voice issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, gst, digital marketing, subscription
